entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bloodvein
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 23.
